title: Poster, 1997-19-283, ca. 1980
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Against a white background intended to simulate interoffice mailing envelopes, black outlines suggest edges, outlines and string fastners creating a tromp-l'oeil effect. Also in black, upper right corner: Delivery / starts / with a / complete / address: And in black lower right reads, Indicate: / Name / Department / Building / Location and at left on edge IBM ans Internal Mail
